text: Martin Creed (born 21 October 1968) is a British artist. He won the Turner Prize in 2001. ==Early life== He was born in Wakefield, West Riding of Yorkshire. He moved with his family to Glasgow when he was 3. ==Personal life== He lives in London. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:English artists Category:Living people Category:People from Glasgow Category:People from Wakefield
title: Martin Creed
